updates.title: Arcade Mode Launched!
updates.content: Dive into the brand new Arcade Mode! Face endless waves of tennis ball machines, collect powerups, and climb the leaderboard. Can you set the highest score?

updates.title: New Powerups Arrived!
updates.content: Unleash the power of the new Neon Dash and Time Freeze powerups. Outsmart your opponents and master the court with these electrifying additions!

updates.title: Tennis Dash Tournament Announced!
updates.content: Get ready for the first official Tennis Dash Tournament! Compete with players worldwide, win exclusive gear, and earn your place in the Hall of Fame.

updates.title: Major Visual Overhaul
updates.content: Experience Tennis Dash like never before with our new neon-inspired visuals, smoother animations, and enhanced effects for a true arcade feel!
